name: Nightmare Escape
description:
Nightmare Escape follows a group of kids who join forces to try and survive their collective nightmare 👻
While the ground crumbles beneath their feet, in an attempt to keep their group from falling apart, terrified kids have to use photon guns to defend themselves from evil spirits.

It was developed in 24 hour for Ubisoft Game Jam.

The team:
Pavle Goloskokovic
Aleksandar Nu Petrovic
Dimitrije Mikovic
Luka Glavonjic
Mladen Krcmarevic
